    A

    addBill(Bill) - Method in class AssemblyManager
    Adds a bill to the assembly manager.
    addMla(MLA) - Method in class AssemblyManager
    Adds an MLA to the assembly manager.
    AssemblyManager - Class in Unnamed Package
    The AssemblyManager class manages a collection of Members of the Legislative Assembly (MLAs) and their associated bills.
    AssemblyManager() - Constructor for class AssemblyManager
    Constructs an AssemblyManager with empty lists of MLAs and bills.

    B

    Bill - Class in Unnamed Package
    The Bill class represents a legislative bill in the assembly.
    Bill(String, String, MLA, int) - Constructor for class Bill
    Constructs a Bill with the specified title, type, MLA, and term.

    C

    ChiefMinister - Class in Unnamed Package
    The ChiefMinister class represents a Chief Minister, which is a specialized type of Member of the Legislative Assembly (MLA).
    ChiefMinister(String, String, String) - Constructor for class ChiefMinister
    Constructs a ChiefMinister with the specified name, constituency, and party.

    D

    Displays all bills for a specified term.
    displayInfo() - Method in class Bill
    Displays the information of the bill in a formatted manner.
